name: Neon Ninja Warrior
description:
Created by Greg Belasco

Built with Game Maker Studio 2

An honored warrior that time has forgotten. His remains were excavated thousands of years in the future and his body was rebuilt with the finest technology money can buy. His benefactors had a plan for him, to do their dirty work. He had different plans. Now trapped in a new body and a new time he has questions that need answering no matter who gets in his way. This is his story.

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D / Arrow Keys

Look/Aim - Mouse Movement

Shoot - Left Mouse Click / Spacebar

GM Commands:

NUM 0 - Title Screen

NUM 1 - Level 1

NUM 2 - Level 2

NUM 3 - Level 3

NUM . - Reset Current Level
